id.description: Value Grabber for the cinema's id

href.description: Value Grabber for the cinemas's href, which should contain a path string relative to the webiste's base url.

slug.description: Value Grabber for the cinema's slug

name.description: Value Grabber for the cinema's name

address.description: Value Grabber for the cinema's address

phone.description: Value Grabber for the cinema's phone

email.description: Value Grabber for the cinema's email

website.description: Value Grabber for the cinema's website

location.description: Value Grabber for the cinema's geo locaction

isTemporarilyClosed.description: Value Grabber to check whether the cinema is temporarily closed.
